title: Experience
subtitle: A quick overview of roles and impact

roles.title: Product Development Specialist
achievements: Technical project lead for Dove Men+Care deodorant innovation launches.

roles.title: Associate Scientist + Process Engineer
achievements: Work stream lead and technical project lead for Dove and Dove Men + Care skin cleansing launches.

roles.title: Health + Wellbeing Intern
achievements: Implemented a comprehensive database site for Unilever's potential health and well-being ingredients, including clinical studies, recommended doses, and warnings.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure that the database site was user-friendly and met the needs of key stakeholders.
Provided ongoing support and maintenance to ensure that the database site continued to meet the evolving needs of Unilever's R&D team.

roles.title: R&D Product Development Intern
achievements: Generated a predictive model through JMP to predict clinical testing results from lab metrics.
Created Dove Body wash prototypes to be used for deposition testing and corneosurfametry along with carrying out initial pH and rheometer measurements.
Improved current methodologies to account for using different formulations in one study.
Provided the team with new insights on how to strength our claims against our top competitors.

roles.title: R&D Science + Technology Intern
achievements: Leveraging in silico analysis of internal/published skin aging transcriptomic datasets to generate novel insights to support our skin rejuvenation program.
Generated hypotheses from external data using in silico bioinformatics tools and draft reports.
Gene expression comparison of external and internal data.
Presented key findings/insights to project manager and team.
